author: ggregory
msg: Fix Clirr reporting, now picks up correct version.

author: rhuijben
msg: * STATUS: Cast -0 vote on the current fix

author: ggregory
msg: Use Java 5 LinkedList API, not Java 6. Note that removeFirstOccurrence(Object) delegates to remove(Object) in Java 6.

author: antelder
msg: Update the JMS binding so that the message format may be either AXIOM or DOM. The default is still DOM as that minimizes the required dependencies but you can now configure it to use AXIOM OMElements which are optimized in some runtime environments

author: thorsten
msg: Fixing parameter call since we now allow objects in the sitemap we need to make sure to request a string otherwise we will get
java.lang.ClassCastException: java.util.Locale cannot be cast to java.lang.String
Bug and solution reported by Ajay Deshwal.
